EmailTemplate.description: Email for partners to use for former dead loan leads
EmailTemplate.name: 18-02 Mock Dead Lead Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Still thinking about solar?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Still thinking about solar?
We chatted previously about a solar installation for your home. We understand that solar ownership was not the right fit for you, but wanted to let you know we are now offering a new way to go solar-- without any additional cost.
HOW? Sign up for a Community Solar share through our partners at BlueWave Solar!
No Money Down - Only pay for solar credits you receive No Installation Necessary - Hassle-free solar! 10% Monthly Energy Savings - Pay for your solar credits at a discount No Cancellation Fees - Change your mind? No problem Feel good! Your local farm creates local jobs and reduces air pollution
Want to learn more? Click Here
Ready to Sign Up? Click Here
Want to talk solar before making your decision?
Reach out, we're happy to help! customercare@bluewavesolar.com (844) 786-4100
We're excited about this new way to offer you the benefits of solar! - YOUR TEAM Powered by BlueWaveSolar
